passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > header:nth-child(10) > height-observer:nth-child(2) > x-header > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(13) > section:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(13) > section:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > main:nth-child(13) > section:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(13) > section:nth-child(9) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > main:nth-child(13) > section:nth-child(10) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h2

any.message: Heading order valid
